statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (13,-3) and (9,5).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{5}-{\left(-{3}\right)}}}{{{9}-{\left({13}\right)}}}=\frac{{8}}{{-{{4}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-{2} (if it's not already reduced)
